tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: AnotherSocialEconomy.com. Report issues at: support@anothersocialeconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: ezToff.com. Report issues at: support@ezToff.com. ezToff.com is a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for booking locally with ezToff, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: ezToff notification about Demand: {demand>key}
{'content':'[*** automated response for demonstration purposes ***]','price':0.01,'total':1}

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short pre-formatted commands

tuv.seg: |--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
wish qty:X due-date:X tags:X {command>footer}

wish wish:{wish>key} qty:{wish>quantity} due-date:{wish>dueDate} locale:{wish>location>postalCode} {wish>location>countryCode} tags:{wish>content} hashtags:{wish>hashTags} metadata:{wish>metadata} {command>footer}
cancel wish:{wish>key} {command>footer}
transform wish:{wish>key} {command>footer}
demand qty:X due-date:X tags:X {command>footer}

demand demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate} locale:{demand>location>postalCode} {demand>location>countryCode} tags:{demand>content} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} {command>footer}
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
list demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>content} metadata:{demand>metadata} {command>footer}
propose proposal:{proposal>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>content} metadata:{demand>metadata} {command>footer}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
rate proposal:{proposal>key} score: :-( comment: {command>footer}

tu.note: IMPORTANT: double-escaping of the suggested return to line character needed as the string is processed twice!

tuv.seg: rate proposal:{proposal>key} score: :-\\| comment: {command>footer}
rate proposal:{proposal>key} score: :-) comment: {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not allowed by the user's profile.| {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial action {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-( Action {user>action} is not allowed by your profile. Send '?{user>action}' for help. {message>footer}

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not allowed by the user's profile.| {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial action {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-( Action {user>action} is not allowed by your profile. Send '?{user>action}' for help. {message>footer}

tu.note: Message sent when the given proposal identifier is incorrect {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial action {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-( A Proposal identifier is required. Send '?{user>action}' for help. {message>footer}

tu.note: Message sent when the given proposal identifier is incorrect {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial command {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}
Message sent when the given proposal identifier is incorrect {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial command {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-( Please verify the Proposal number you wish to act on and try again. {message>footer}

tu.note: Message sent when the given proposal identifier is incorrect {user>name}: display name of the logged user {user>action}: initial command {user>command}: initial command {message>footer}

tuv.seg: :-( You cannot act on the Proposal:{proposal>key} when it is in state:{proposal>state). {message>footer}

tu.note: Message sent to an 'UNCONFIRMED' consumer to invite him to reply to the email to confirm this email address {landingPage>title}: landing page title {landingPage>url}: landing page url {initiator>name}: display name of the logged user {demand}: just posted demand {influencer>*}: influencer attributes

seg.p: Thank you for trusting our {landingPage>title} service. Since this is your first time using our service, can you please confirm your email address by replying to this message? Once received, we'll continue processing your request.

Please note that we are currently working to support Yahoo! web email. In the meantime, you can either use an email client like Outlook Express, or, contact Support@AnotherSocialEconomy.com for further assistance.

Merci pour la confiance témoignée à notre service. Puisque vous utilisez notre service pour la première fois, veuillez confirmer votre adresse de courriel en répondant à ce message. Une fois votre réponse reçue, nous continuerons de traiter votre demande.

Veuillez noter que nous travaillons pour faciliter l'interaction avec les utilisateurs de l'outil Web de Yahoo!. Si vous utilisez un outil comme Mac Mail ou Outlook Express pour gérer ce compte, il n'y a pas de problème. Dans le cas contraire, contacter Support@AnotherSocialEconomy.com pour que nous vous aidions personnellement.

tu.note: Message sent to an 'UNCONFIRMED' consumer to invite him to reply to the email to confirm this email address {landingPage>title}: landing page title {landingPage>url}: landing page url {initiator>name}: display name of the logged user {demand}: just posted demand {influencer>*}: influencer attributes

seg.p: Thank you for trusting our {landingPage>title} service with your needs of: {demand>content}. Since this is your first time using our service, can you please confirm your email address by replying to this message? Once received, we'll continue processing your request.

Please note that we are currently working to support Yahoo! web email. In the meantime, you can either use an email client like Outlook Express, or, contact Support@AnotherSocialEconomy.com for further assistance.

Merci pour la confiance témoignée avec la soumission de votre rercherhe de voiture: {demand>content}. Puisque vous utilisez notre service pour la première fois, veuillez confirmer votre adresse de courriel en répondant à ce message. Une fois votre réponse reçue, nous continuerons de traiter votre demande.

Veuillez noter que nous travaillons pour faciliter l'interaction avec les utilisateurs de l'outil Web de Yahoo!. Si vous utilisez un outil comme Mac Mail ou Outlook Express pour gérer ce compte, il n'y a pas de problème. Dans le cas contraire, contacter Support@AnotherSocialEconomy.com pour que nous vous aidions personnellement.

tu.note: Message to publish about a landing page report {report}: just posted demand {source>shortUrl}: shortened URL of the landing page

tuv.seg: Someone is thinking about buying a {report>content} in the Montreal area.

tu.note: Message to publish about a landing page report {report}: just posted demand {source>shortUrl}: shortened URL of the landing page

tuv.seg: Someone is thinking about buying a used {report>metadata>make} {report>metadata>model} in the Montreal area.

tu.note: Message to publish about a landing page report {report}: just posted demand {source>shortUrl}: shortened URL of the landing page

tuv.seg: Someone is thinking about reserving a tee-off for {report>quantity} in the Montreal area.

tu.note: Message confirming the wish canceling to the consumer.| {wish>*}: wish attributes {wish>owner>name}: name of the wish owner {wish>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tuv.seg:
Hi {wish>owner>name},
Your wish {wish>key} has been canceled.
If you enjoyed using AnotherSocialEconomy.com, please recommend us to your friends, or, simply CC them next time. {message>footer}
Wish: {wish>key}.

tu.note: Message confirming the wish canceling to the transformation initiator.| {wish>*}: wish attributes {user>name}: name of the transformation initiator {wish>owner>name}: name of the wish owner {wish>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {user>name}, the wish:{wish>key} created by {wish>owner>name} has been successfully transformed. The new demand is going to be validated and you'll receive an update shortly.

tu.note: Message confirming the wish canceling to the transformation initiator.| {user>name}: name of the transformation initiator {wish>*}: wish attributes {wish>owner>name}: name of the wish owner {wish>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

Hi {user>name},
The wish {wish>key} created by {wish>owner>name} has been transformed into a demand. The new demand is going to be validated band you'll receive an update shortly.
{message>footer}
Wish: {wish>key}.

tuv.seg: FYI. Can you supply demand:{demand>key} tags:{demand>content} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the 'X' and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:X unit-price:X total-cost:X due-date:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI. Can you supply demand:{demand>key} tags:{demand>content} hashtags:{demand>hashTags} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate} metadata:{demand>metadata}?| If yes then replace the 'X' and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:X players:{demand>quantity} round-price:X total-cost:X tee-time:{demand>dueDate} metadata:{demand>metadata}'.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
We're confirming your update of the demand within {demand>range} {demand>rangeUnit} of {demand>location>postalCode} {demand>location>countryCode}, on {demand>dueDate}. You've also requested:
{demand>content}
We're anonymously broadcasting your demand {demand>key} to relevant stores and will communicate their proposals, as soon as possible, to you and {demand>cc} on your behalf.
If for any reason, you're no longer interested in this demand, you can send an email by clicking Cancel demand, or, if you've received this message in error, click There's been some kind of mistake :-(
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, brought to you by {influencer>name}.

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg:
Hi {demand>owner>name},
Thank you for closing demand {demand>key}. In return, we'll be updating your Closing Rate shortly. In the meantime, we invite you to share your experience by writing a review with {reviewSystem>name}.
We thank you once again for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com and hope you'll recomment us to your friends.
AnotherSocialEconomy.com: Your missing link between shopping online & buying offline. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

tu.note: Message confirming the demand closing.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg:
Hi {demand>owner>name},
Thank you for closing the ezToff demand {demand>key}. In return, we'll be updating your Closing Rate shortly. In the meantime, we invite you to share your experience by writing a review with {reviewSystem>name}.
We thank you once again for reserving your tee-time wth ezToff.com.com and hope you'll recomment us to your friends. {message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

tu.note: Message inviting the associate to close its proposal.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

Hi {proposal>owner>name},
The demand {demand>key} for proposal {proposal>key}, due on {proposal>dueDate} has been closed. Please close your matching proposal {proposal>key} in order to better your Rating.
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

Hi {proposal>owner>name},
The demand {demand>key} for the reservation under ezToff proposal {proposal>key} on {proposal>dueDate} has been closed. Please close your matching proposal {proposal>key} in order to better your Rating.
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.

Message confirming the proposal canceling to the sale associate.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, your proposal:{proposal>key} has been successfully canceled.

tu.note: Message confirming the proposal canceling to the sale associate.| {proposal>*}: proposal attributes {proposal>owner>name}: name of the proposal owner {proposal>metadata>*}: optional meta data from the proposal (vertical dependent)

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {demand>owner>name}, the proposal:{proposal>key} you confirmed has been canceled.| Your demand:{demand>key} has been re-broadcasted to stores around. Send "cancel demand:{demand>key}" to stop the process.

Hi {demand>owner>name},
{store>name} has canceled their proposal {proposal>key}. As the result, your demand {demand>key} has been forwarded to stores in your area.
If for any reason, you're no longer interested in this demand, you can send an email by clicking Cancel demand, or, if you've received this message in error, click There's been some kind of mistake :-(
{message>footer}
Demand: {demand>key}, Proposal: {proposal>key}.
